name: bdeornelas.github.io
description: Personal website for Dr. Benjamin De Ornelas

scripts.build: npm run build:tailwind && parcel build assets/js/main.js assets/css/style.css --dist-dir dist --no-source-maps
scripts.vercel-build: bundle install && npm run build:tailwind && bundle exec jekyll build && npm run build
scripts.build:full: npm run build && cp dist/css/style.css assets/css/style.min.css && cp dist/js/main.js assets/js/main.min.js && bundle exec jekyll build && cp -r claude-project-files _site/ && cp ESC_GUIDELINES_TOC.md _site/
